ing: 3 (12 fluid ounce) cans frozen orange juice concentrate, thawed
1 (12 fluid ounce) can frozen lemonade concentrate, thawed
des: "Yummy whiskey sour recipe that goes down so easy! Look out because it'll hit you before you know it!"
ins: In a large pitcher or punch bowl, stir together the orange juice concentrate, lemonade concentrate and water until well blended. Stir in whiskey and garnish with maraschino cherries and orange slices.
